title: Hotel and Cruise News: Art on the Rhine, a Resort in Mexico
text:
Our morning travel news digest, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
NEW RIVIERA MAYA RESORT FROM THOMPSON
It won’t open until Nov. 20, but already the Thompson Playa del Carmen resort is accepting reservations for winter stays on Mexico’s Riviera Maya. The property will be split between a 92-room main hotel on the restaurant-and-shop-lined Avenida Quinta and an oceanfront Beach House a few blocks away. The latter, scheduled to open in January, will have an additional 27 rooms, plus a pool and beach cabanas. Management is positioning the dual configuration as offering the best of both worlds; a high-energy central location with a 30,000-square-foot rooftop featuring a pool, cabanas, restaurant and lounge, and a more tranquil beach alternative with another restaurant, bar and swimming pool, along with activities including stand-up paddleboarding and scuba diving. The two addresses are about five minutes apart by foot. Rooms from $240.
